title: Tiki Totem
summaries: The Tiki Totem is a Hardmode pet-summoning item that spawns a Tiki Spirit that floats and spins above the player's head. Unlike most pets, it will not teleport to the player when the player moves too quickly for it to keep up; it will simply float straight towards the player. The Tiki Totem is purchased from the Witch Doctor for 2 PC when he is spoken to in the Jungle biome during Hardmode.
